channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Russia claims Ukraine fired drones at Putin’s residence: Will this derail the peace talks?
OpenAI is hiring ‘head of preparedness’ for $555,000. Is this the toughest job in AI?
Hamas must disarm, Iran threat & more: Key takeaways from Trump and Netanyahu’s meeting in Florida
How 2025 is one of the 3 hottest years on record
Khaleda Zia passes away: How a ‘shy housewife’ became one of Bangladesh’s most powerful leaders
History Today: How Saddam Hussein was executed, ending an era in Iraq
Revisiting Pakistan’s nuclear programme through declassified US records
item.description: Newly declassified transcripts reveal that global leaders privately acknowledged the dangers of Pakistan’s nuclear arsenal while publicly maintaining silence

item.title: How 2025 unfolded for Africa amid political and economic uncertainty
item.description: The foundation of governance – peace, security, and stability – seemed shaken in several parts of Africa, exposing a sizable portion of its 1.4 billion population to death, danger, and untold hardships

item.title: Israel recognises Somaliland: Why India should follow suit
item.description: By standing firm in favour of Somaliland, India can counter Chinese assertion in the region and ensure a permanent gateway into Africa, as well as trade access to the continent’s second-most populous country, Ethiopia

item.title: Pakistan’s dangerous fantasy of reclaiming Bangladesh through propaganda and intimidation
item.description: History teaches us that Pakistan’s hostility toward Bangladesh never begins with tanks or fighter jets – it begins with narrative and well-orchestrated propaganda

item.title: Heritage escapes near Delhi to beat New Year’s rush
item.description: With the New Year around the corner, here are some offbeat heritage options that offer not just a low AQI, but also peace and solace

item.title: Why Indian Navy must safeguard Oman’s maritime interests
item.description: India’s role becomes increasingly important as the United States retrenches for economic and ideological reasons, while China’s assertiveness intensifies in the region
